channel.title: Need help setting up gtl vote
channel.description: When i try to claim my prize it says gtl [GTL Vote] SQL Error occured. It was pre added and i tryed changing the database name database address user and pass and that didnt work i set up everything correctly websided so there is a problem server sided any who can help please dont be shy. willing to reward generously

item.title: Need help setting up gtl vote
item.dc:creator: @ixia ixia
item.description:
@ixia wrote:

If youâ€™re getting SQL error you might not have the MySQL libs in your server, your host might be denying the connection (some providers do not allow incoming SQL connections or you need to add your IP to remote MySQL in the web host), be sure to check if your firewall is not blocking the connection.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help setting up gtl vote
